## **TEST PLAN**

Prerequisites:

## **Pre-merge author checklist**

- [ ] I've clearly explained:
- [ ] What problem this PR is solving.
- [ ] How this problem was solved.
- [ ] How reviewers can test my changes.
- [ ] I’ve indicated what issue this PR is linked to
- [ ] I’ve included tests if applicable.
- [ ] I’ve documented any added code.

## **Pre-merge reviewer checklist**

- [ ] I've manually tested the PR (e.g. pull the branch, recreate stream, run
      the updated stream, and test code being changed).
- [ ] I've reviewed the code changes in the PR, and they make sense.
